entry.title: SWPSA15
entry.summary:
Vendor: STARMAXDESIGN
Type:
Price: 0.00

The reflective properties of mirror wall panels make them ideal for lighting design. The mirror wall panel can reflect and diffuse the light to the whole space through reasonable lighting arrangement, providing a uniform and soft lighting effect. In addition, mirror wall panels can also create unique lighting effects, enhancing the atmosphere and visual effects of the indoor environment. For example, applying mirror wall panels to small spaces or narrow areas, such as corridors, stairwells, or small rooms, can increase the spaciousness and brightness of the space.

Mirror wall panels are often used as decorative materials to display walls, windows, or counters in commercial and retail environments, enhancing the attractiveness and display of products through reflecting and diffusing light. Mirror wall panels can also create a unique brand image and sense of space, attracting customers' attention.
